h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Instead, either stop moving to deflect, or take the blows and race to the other side -- but do take a moment to glance to the right at a large purple-lit chamber you can spy ominously through the bars.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)'.
The content is as follows:
Instead, either stop moving to deflect, or take the blows and race to the other side -- but do take a moment to glance to the right at a large purple-lit chamber you can spy ominously through the bars.
